mapper.select: SELECT fi.* FROM f_form_field ff, f_field_info fi WHERE ff.FIELDID = fi.id AND ff.FORMID = #{formid} ORDER BY ff.SORT
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM f_form_field ff, f_field_info fi WHERE ff.FIELDID = fi.id

SELECT fi.FIELDCODE AS fieldcode, fi.FIELDNAME AS fieldname, fi.STATUS AS status, IFNULL(ff.COLSPAN, fi.COLSPAN) AS colspan, ff.FORMID AS formid, ff.FIELDID AS fieldid, ff.SORT AS sort FROM f_form_field ff, f_field_info fi WHERE ff.FIELDID = fi.id
ORDER BY ff.SORT ASC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM f_field_info t WHERE t.`STATUS` = 'N'
AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM f_form_field ff WHERE ff.FORMID=#{formid} AND ff.FIELDID=t.ID)
